properties.areaDesc: Bremerton and Vicinity; Hood Canal Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 2:01AM PST until January 13 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow fell across the north part of Hood Canal overnight
in the convergence zone. Areas of heavy snow fell from Quilcene
across the north part of the Kitsap Peninsula. The convergence
zone remains in the north and scattered snow showers are
possible with 1 or 2 inches of additional snow likely this
morning. Expect slick travel conditions this morning in some
areas--generally north of Bremerton.

* WHERE...Western Kitsap and the lowlands of eastern Jefferson
and Mason Counties, including Brinnon, Seabeck, and Shelton
and Bremerton and vicinity, including Indianola, Bainbridge
Island, Silverdale, and Port Orchard.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING
